member.name: T:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.CSharp.AstBuilderState
member.summary: State for one decompiler thread. There should be at most one of these per CPU. This class is not thread safe and must only be accessed by the owner thread.

member.name: F:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.CSharp.AstBuilderState.XmlDoc_StringBuilder
member.summary: instance used by XML doc code. This is always in a random state (random text) and caller must Clear() it before use.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.CSharp.AstBuilderState.Reset
member.summary: Called to re-use this instance for another decompilation. Only the fields that need resetting will be reset.

member.name: T:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.CSharp.BuilderCache
member.summary: One instance is created and stored in . It's used by the decompiler threads to get an instance.

member.name: T:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.CSharp.BuilderState
member.summary: Gets the from the pool and returns it when gets called.

member.name: T:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.CSharp.CSharpDecompiler
member.summary: Decompiler logic for C#.

member.name: T:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.CSharp.CSharpDecompiler.SelectFieldTransform
member.summary: Removes all top-level members except for the specified fields.

member.name: T:dnSpy.Decompiler.ILSpy.Core.IL.ILDecompiler
member.summary: IL language support.
member.remarks: Currently comes in two versions: flat IL (detectControlStructure=false) and structured IL (detectControlStructure=true).
